name: The Domovoi
description:
The Domovoi is a short work of interactive fiction written by Kevin Snow, the creator of Bravemule, with artwork from Patrick Bonaduce and sound from Priscilla White.

Your friend, a folk storyteller, has offered to perform her latest work. As her audience, it is your task to advise how her tale should unfold.

The Domovoi is available in English and Russian for free.

Credits

Story: Kevin Snow
Artwork: Patrick Bonaduce
Editor: Andi McClure
Sound: Priscilla White
Russian Localization: Олег Козлов

Content Warning

The Domovoi contains depictions of violence and illustrations of spiders.

Reviews

"This astonishing short Twine game combines beautiful art with beautiful writing to create something...well, it begins with a B. Play it, even if you think you don't like Twine games – then play it again."
- Tom Sykes, PC Gamer

"[The Domovoi] is plucked from Slavic folklore and the actors are new to me, which made playing through the brief encounter a pleasant educational experience. It helps that the story is delightfully – if sparsely – illustrated, flickering with a glow that fits the setting and mood."
- Adam Smith, Rock, Paper, Shotgun
